name: Blender HW Project
short_description:
This project aims to develope the Python code necessary to enable external PC hardware to connect to the Blender UI and Gaming engine.

This project currently requires schematic design, hardware design, python programming of Serial Ports through pyserial, knowledge of the Blender API, and knowledge of the FTDI Chip.

This project will not seek funding until a proof of concept is documented with code and hardware designs available through this project.

This project will be soon seeking an Arduino programmer with his/her own Arduino and should have knowledge of Python 3.4.2+.  This person must have the necissary Hardware components for at least an Arduino proof of concept.

This project will be seeking a professional Python developer with knowledge of Serial devices on Windows, Linux, and Mac to verify code created by this project.

I will setup a placeholder page in the next few days to serve as a conceptual overview of this project.

Thank you for your interest!
summary: Create a hardware front end for Blender UI and gaming engine.
